ygData.subject: Re: A lot of misinformation
ygData.msgSnippet: I would be very interested in such a guild, since that s what I already strive to do - sometimes risking my neck.  Please post information to the board if it
ygData.messageBody:
I would be very interested in such a guild, since that's what I already
strive to do - sometimes risking my neck. Please post information to the
board if it gets started.

I also like the name Song of Service.

Kendrin.

According to the illustrious Bob Stewart...
:)We could start one. Consider a guild, perhaps of bards or perhaps allowing
:)other classes, whose primary purpose is to help one another and others.
<snip>
:)We could name it, say, "Song of <something>" like Harmony, Service, Aid,
:)or such. I like "Song of Service." If you're in trouble, call out SoS.
:-)}
